Video Speeder - Control Video Playback Speed Anywhere
Take control of your video-watching experience with Video Speeder, the perfect extension for adjusting playback speed across various video platforms, including YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, and more! Whether you're speeding up tutorials, slowing down action sequences, or fine-tuning your learning experience, Video Speeder gives you the flexibility you need. No sign-ups, no fuss—just simple, efficient video speed control.

Video Speeder is ideal for students, professionals, binge-watchers, or anyone looking to enhance productivity by adjusting video speeds on the fly. It works on a wide range of HTML5 video players and can be used across multiple websites, allowing you to control your media exactly the way you want.

⭐ FEATURES AT A GLANCE ⭐

🎥 Adjust Playback Speed - Speed up or slow down videos easily with just a few clicks. Choose any speed between 0.25x and 4x, giving you full control over how fast or slow your videos play.

🔄 Increase/Decrease Playback Speed Gradually - Fine-tune your viewing experience by increasing or decreasing speed in small increments. Perfect for those moments when you need a slight adjustment in video pace.

🔧 Reset to Normal Speed - Need to get back to standard playback? Reset your video speed to 1.0x with a single click.

🔍 Works on Multiple Platforms - Compatible with a variety of websites that use HTML5 video players, including YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, and more. You can even test it on local video files in your browser!

⚙️ Real-Time Speed Indicator - Know exactly what speed you're watching at with a clean and minimal speed indicator. The indicator briefly shows your current playback rate when you make changes, so you’re always aware of your adjustments.

⚡ Instant Changes - Experience real-time speed adjustment without interruptions or lag. Whether you're setting a custom speed or nudging it up or down, Video Speeder applies changes immediately for a smooth viewing experience.

🔥 HOW IT WORKS 🔥
Video Speeder leverages the power of the built-in HTML5 video player, adjusting the playbackRate property of any video element in the browser. The extension integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience, allowing you to tweak the speed of videos effortlessly, without complicated setup or configuration.

Here’s how you can use Video Speeder:

Set Custom Speed: Enter your desired playback speed (e.g., 2.0x) and watch the video speed up to double time or slow it down to absorb every detail.

Increase/Decrease Speed Gradually: Click the increase or decrease buttons to adjust speed in increments (e.g., +0.1x or -0.1x), letting you find the perfect playback pace.

Reset to Normal: Anytime you need to reset, simply click the reset button, and the video will return to its normal speed (1.0x).

Real-Time Speed Monitoring: A temporary on-screen indicator displays the current speed every time you make a change, ensuring you know exactly what speed you’re watching at.

🚀 EXCITING USE CASES 🚀
🔹 For Students: Speed up online courses, webinars, or tutorials to get through the material faster, or slow down challenging concepts for better understanding.

🔹 For Content Reviewers: Quickly review videos by increasing playback speed, making content consumption more efficient.

🔹 For Sports Enthusiasts: Slow down replays or fast-forward through dull moments to catch every important play.

🔹 For Language Learners: Slow down videos to improve comprehension of foreign languages, or speed up once you're more comfortable with the language.

Plus, with seamless integration into your browsing experience, you can control video speeds with minimal disruption to your workflow.

Video Speeder respects your privacy. The extension does not track your activity or collect personal data. We prioritize your privacy and guarantee that no sensitive information is shared or sold.

🛠️ TROUBLESHOOTING & SUPPORT 🛠️
If you ever encounter issues with video playback or speed changes not sticking, try the following:

Check for Conflicting Scripts: Some websites, like YouTube, may have internal scripts that revert playback speed. Video Speeder includes a MutationObserver feature to detect and reapply your desired speed automatically if changes are overridden.

Use Supported Sites: While most websites with HTML5 video players are supported, some may use custom or protected players. If Video Speeder doesn't work on a specific site, it may be due to unique restrictions of the platform.

Browser Compatibility: Video Speeder works on modern browsers like Chrome and Firefox. Ensure your browser is up to date for the best performance.

Test on Other Platforms: Besides YouTube, you can test Video Speeder on Vimeo, Dailymotion, and local video files by simply dragging them into your browser.

⭐ NO SIGN-UPS, NO HASSLE ⭐
Enjoy Video Speeder without any need for registration or sign-up. The extension is completely free to use, and all its core features are available immediately after installation. Start optimizing your video-watching experience today!
